aboutNear.metaDescription: Ang Near Blocks ay ang nangungunang Blockchain Explorer, Search, API at Analytics Platform para sa NEAR blockchain, isang decentralized smart contracts platform.
aboutNear.heading: Tungkol sa Near Blocks
aboutNear.content: Ang Near Blocks ay ang nangungunang Blockchain Explorer, Search, API at Analytics Platform para sa NEAR blockchain, isang decentralized smart contracts platform.
